complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup process into subtasks for each major configuration step: Next.js project initialization, TypeScript setup, Tailwind CSS installation and configuration, ESLint/Prettier setup, project folder structure, Git initialization, CI/CD pipeline configuration, environment variables setup, GSAP installation, and static site generation configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple foundational setup steps, each with its own configuration and verification requirements. It covers tooling, code quality, styling, version control, CI/CD, and environment management, all of which are critical and non-trivial for a robust project foundation[1][3][5].

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for color palette implementation, typography setup, component library creation (buttons, cards, forms, navigation), responsive breakpoints, and design system documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a comprehensive design system requires careful planning and implementation of multiple interdependent elements (colors, typography, components, responsiveness, and documentation), each of which can be a significant effort.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for header component, footer component, page container, navigation system (mobile/desktop), and accessibility testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Developing reusable layout components with responsive and animated navigation involves both UI/UX and technical complexity, but is more focused than a full design system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for main page routing, dynamic routes, basic page components, error pages, metadata/SEO setup, page transitions, and breadcrumb navigation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Setting up routing and page structure in Next.js involves both static and dynamic routes, error handling, and SEO, each requiring careful implementation and testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for video background implementation, overlay/CTA, performance optimization, first-time visitor popup, and responsive styling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While visually important, the hero section is a contained feature with clear boundaries, though it involves animation, performance, and conditional logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for each homepage feature: program highlights, Vietnam Youth Basketball League, programs overview, testimonial showcase, VNBA camps, recreation center, partner logos, process visualization, and CTA.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task covers multiple interactive and content-rich sections, each with unique UI and logic, requiring modular development and integration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for program data model, class cards, schedule visualization, FAQ accordion, program-specific CTAs, and responsive design.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The Programs page combines data modeling, interactive UI, and dynamic filtering, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for founding story, mission/philosophy, coaches grid, community impact, partner logos, and animations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a content-driven page with some interactive and animated elements, but less technical complexity than core system tasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for recreation center overview, court comparison, availability teaser, booking integration, pricing/facility details, and partnerships.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This page involves content presentation, booking integration, and comparison features, but is relatively contained.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for Google Forms integration, Google Maps embedding, contact info section, FAQ, and responsive design.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The contact page requires third-party integrations and responsive layout, but is a standard web feature.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for reusable Google Forms component, site-wide integration, program-specific pre-filling, confirmation page, Google Sheets integration, and validation/error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating a lead generation system across the site with data capture, validation, and confirmation flows is technically demanding and critical for business goals.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for GSAP core/plugins setup, page transitions, scroll-triggered animations, micro-interactions, burger button animations, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing a robust animation framework with multiple interaction types and performance considerations is moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for mobile-first approach, responsive versions of all components, breakpoint testing, responsive typography, media responsiveness, and touch optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Ensuring full responsiveness across all components and pages is a cross-cutting concern that requires extensive testing and refinement.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Google Tag Manager and Analytics Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for GTM setup, GA4 integration, event tracking, conversion goals, enhanced ecommerce tracking, and custom dimensions/metrics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Analytics integration is essential but follows established patterns, with moderate complexity in event and conversion tracking.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for data models, static content files, utility functions, content organization, filtering/sorting, and admin documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing a lightweight CMS with structured data and utilities is moderately complex, especially with filtering and admin documentation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for Next.js Image optimization, video optimization, SVG animations, WebP setup, icon system, and accessibility features.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Optimizing and integrating diverse media types for performance and accessibility is a technical and detail-oriented task.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for code splitting/lazy loading, static asset optimization, critical CSS extraction, caching strategies, CDN configuration, and third-party script optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Achieving high performance targets requires advanced techniques across the stack, with careful measurement and tuning.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for semantic HTML, ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, color contrast, screen reader compatibility, and reduced motion alternatives.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Ensuring WCAG 2.1 AA compliance is a specialized and thorough process, requiring both automated and manual testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for metadata optimization, structured data markup, sitemap.xml creation, robots.txt configuration, SEO-friendly URLs, and content optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: SEO involves multiple technical and content-related optimizations, each with its own best practices and verification steps.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for browser matrix setup, functionality testing, visual consistency checks, performance testing, and issue resolution.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive cross-browser testing is time-consuming and detail-oriented, requiring both automated and manual approaches.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for Privacy Policy page, Terms of Service page, cookie consent banner, footer links, and print-friendly styling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Legal pages are mostly static content with some integration and accessibility requirements, making this a lower-complexity task.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for CI/CD pipeline setup, hosting configuration, SSL certificate implementation, CDN setup, redirects/canonical URLs, and deployment documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Deployment involves multiple systems (CI/CD, hosting, SSL, CDN) and requires careful coordination and documentation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for technical documentation, user guides, maintenance docs, SEO guidelines, and troubleshooting guide.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive documentation is essential but follows a clear structure, with moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for test plan creation, functional testing, usability testing, performance testing, security testing, compatibility testing, and issue documentation/prioritization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive QA covers all aspects of the site, requiring detailed planning, execution, and coordination across multiple domains.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: List subtasks for pre-launch checklist, final security checks, production deployment, post-deployment testing, monitoring setup, and launch announcement.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Preparing for launch involves coordination of final checks, deployment, monitoring, and communication, all of which are critical and time-sensitive.
